Milojević: Mi smo u Beogradu drugačija ekipa, trudićemo se da ispišemo novu istoriju
05 Nov 2019, 14:19 by Zile
Uoči meča sa Totenhemom Vladan Milojević je na konferenciji za medije izjavio da je ponosan što će njegovi igrači odmeriti snage sa rivalom iz krema svetskog fudbala.
– Sutra nas očekuje teška utakmica. Još jedan u nizu velikih evropskih duela koje igramo na našem stadionu. Dolazi nam protivnik iz samog krema svetskog fudbala. Imamo priliku da pred našim navijačima odigramo protiv ozbiljnog protivnika koji je svih ovih godina pravio dobre rezultate, što u Premijer ligi, što u Ligi šampiona, u kojoj su prošle sezone došli do finala. Ponosan sam što možemo da igramo ovakve susrete i mislim da ćemo se predstaviti u najboljem svetlu. Nadam se da ćemo odigrati čvrstu utakmicu. Od mojih igrača očekujem da sutra budu fokusirani na teren i da daju svoj maksimum, rekao je Milojević.
Totenhem je favorit da prođe u osminu finala.
– Totenhem je uz Bajern favorit za prolazak u osminu finala Lige šampiona. Fenomenalna su ekipa, videli ste našu utakmicu protiv njih u Londonu. Imaju odlične pojedince, znaju šta hoće, imaju dobrog trenera koji je jedan od najzaslužnijih za sjajne rezultate koje ostvaruju. Veoma su brzi u fazi napada i moraćemo posebnu pažnju da obratimo na to. Ipak, ne plašimo se nikog. Očekujem da moji igrači sutra izađu i pokažu šta znaju, a neka rezultat bude u skladu sa tim.
Prošle godine, 6. novembra Zvezda je u Beogradu bila bolja od Liverpula.
– Nisam neko ko voli da obećava, ali uvek verujem u pozitivne stvari. Ipak, Totenhem i Liverpul od prošle godine su dve različite ekipe i nema mesta za poređenjima. Činjenica je da smo mi drugačija ekipa kada igramo kod kuće i da je protivnicima veoma teško da igraju pred punim tribinama na kojima su naši navijači. Sve što je bilo juče, treba ostaviti u prošlosti, a mi ćemo se truditi da pišemo novu istoriju.
Milojević se ne opterećuje načinom igre u evropskim mečevima.
– Ne opterećujemo se time, već se spremamo za svaku utakmicu posebno. Ako napadnemo protivnika i primimo pet golova, onda pojedinci budu nezadovoljni rezultatom, a kad se zatvorimo i odigramo nešto defanzivnije, onda budu komentari da nismo šutnuli na gol. Što se zdravstvenog stanja igrača tiče, videćemo danas posle treninga. Vukanović je pod znakom pitanja, Gobeljić takođe, ali je u nešto boljem stanju od našeg napadača.
Na kraju poruka da će se gosti u Beogradu osećati bezbedno.
– Mogu da garantujem da će se ovde svi osećati bezbedno. Kod nas u ekipi imamo igrače sa različitim bojama kože i nikada nisu imali problem. Neće ga sutra imati ni Totenhemovi fudbaleri. Pokazaćemo da smo pravi domaćini i da je ovo zemlja koja prihvata različitosti. Verujem da će naši navijači sutra biti sjajni i pozivam ih da dođu u što većem broju da nas podrže, zaključio je trener Crvene zvezde.
Meč je na programu u sredu od 21 sat.

Milojevic: We are a different team in Belgrade, we will try to write a new history
05 Nov 2019, 14:19 by Zile
Ahead of the match with Tottenham, Vladan Milojevic said at a press conference that he is proud that his players will weigh up with rivals from the cream of world football.
- We have a tough game tomorrow. Another in a series of great European duels that we play in our stadium. An opponent from the very cream of world football is coming. We have the opportunity to play in front of our fans against a serious opponent who has made good results all these years, both in the Premier League and in the Champions League, in which they reached the finals last season. I am proud that we can play meetings like this and I think we will present ourselves in the best light. I hope we play a solid game. I expect my players to be focused on the field tomorrow and to give their maximum, Milojevic said.
Tottenham are favorites to make it to the eighth finals.
- Tottenham is Bayern's favorite to reach the eighth Champions League final. They're a phenomenal team, you saw our match against them in London. They have great individuals, they know what they want, they have a good coach who is one of the most responsible for the great results they achieve. They are very fast in the attack phase and we will need to pay special attention to this. Yet we are not afraid of anyone. I expect my players to come out tomorrow and show what they know, and let the result be accordingly.
Last year, on November 6, the Star was better than Liverpool in Belgrade.
- I'm not someone who likes to make promises, but I always believe in positive things. Still, Tottenham and Liverpool are two different teams from last year and there is no room for comparison. The fact is that we are a different team when we play at home and it is very difficult for our opponents to play in front of the full stands where our fans are. Everything that was yesterday should be left behind in the past, and we will strive to write new history.
Milojevic does not bother with the way he plays in European matches.
- We do not burden ourselves with this, but we prepare for each game separately. If we attack an opponent and receive five goals, then individuals are dissatisfied with the result, and when we close and play something more defensive, then there are comments that we have not kicked the goal. As for the health of the players, we will see today after training. Vukanovic is questionable, Gobeljic too, but is in slightly better shape than our striker.
At the end of the message that guests in Belgrade will feel safe.
- I can guarantee that everyone here will feel safe. In our team we have players with different skin colors and never had a problem. Not even Tottenham footballers will have him tomorrow. We will show that we are the real hosts and that this is a country that embraces diversity. I believe that our fans will be great tomorrow and I urge them to come as much as possible to support us, the Red Star coach concluded.
The match is on the program Wednesday 9pm.
